name: TEXAS LAND TITLE ASSOCIATION
description: Association in support of the title industry in Texas
sampleDescriptions: Monitor issues regarding the land title industry; RESPA and TILA integration (TRID).  Monitor HR 3978 and HR 5078, TRID Improvement, Act and S. 2155.
Monitor tax reform and impact on like-kind exchanges and home mortgage interest deduction and HR 1.
